Package com.example.freeturilo.connection

Interface ExternalConnection.Builder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    APIConnection.Builder
    Enclosing interface:
    ExternalConnection
    public static interface ExternalConnection.Builder
    Builder of external connections.

    Object of class implementing this interface builds I/O connections with custom paths and request methods.

    This interface should be treated as a factory for external connections. It has been designed to support HTTP/HTTPS connections but could also be used for other types of I/O connections (it is used with FileStreams for testing purposes). For feasibility of understanding the methods will be described as if they were methods used for HTTP/HTTPS connections.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miko≈Çaj Terzyk
    See Also:
    ExternalConnection, APIConnection.Builder

        Sets the request method of the created connection.
        Parameters:

      • appendPath

        ExternalConnection.Builder appendPath​(java.lang.String path)
        Appends a path fragment to the current path prepared for the created connection.
        Parameters:
        path - a string equal to the appended path fragment
        Returns:
        this builder with updated path

      • create

        ExternalConnection create()
                   throws APIException
        Creates an external connection.
        Returns:
        the created connection with specified path and request method
        Throws:
        APIException - an exception representing an error which occurred when trying to create the external connection
